briefdescription.para: SA insertion or replacement control selections for any selective frames.
SA insertion or replacement control selections for all transmit frames.

detaileddescription.para: CSR clock range: 60-100MHz <==> MDC clock: CSR clock / 42
CSR clock range: 100-150MHz <==> MDC clock: CSR clock / 62
CSR clock range: 20-35MHz <==> MDC clock: CSR clock / 16
CSR clock range: 35-60MHz <==> MDC clock: CSR clock / 26
CSR clock range: 150-250MHz <==> MDC clock: CSR clock / 102
CSR clock range: 250-300MHz <==> MDC clock: CSR clock / 124

briefdescription.para: CSR clock range and MDC clock selections.

simplesect.para: The suggested range of CSR clock is approximately between the frequency range 1.0MHz-2.5MHz. You can achieve higher frequency of the MDC clock than the frequency limit of 2.5MHz(specified in the IEEE Std 802.3) and program a clock divider of lower value. Program the value which is no less than enet_csr_60m_to_100m_mdc_csr_div_4 only if the interfacing chips support faster MDC clocks.
